attributes.action: SACKING OR RESIGNATION HARINGEY SOCIAL SERVICES TOP MANAGEMENT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I with so many other people, who heard about Baby P who was killed by his brutal parents need to look into why Social Services went to see this poor child sixty times, and did notice that he was being physically abused. I would like the top management to be sacked or resign for negligence. We cannot let another child die under there management

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
